title: My pixel 4 xl will not allow a sim card to be used, it tells me unlock is needed
content: My phone tells me it needs to be unlocked to use a sim card, but it isn't locked. I contacted Sprint and Verizon it isn't blacklisted and neither can help they just ask for the account info but there isn't an acct..  this phone is on MetroPCS and had never been used at either other carrier
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
